title: Removing a working set immediately makes changes
description: Bug 14197: Removing a working set immediately makes changes
OB: When I create a working set with one project and select it, the package view is filtered.
EB: I expect that when I remove a working set, it should not immediately make any changes to the package view. It should only remove the working set without affecting the package view.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Create a working set with one project and select it, so the package view is filtered.
2. Open the working set dialog again.
3. Create a second working set.
4. Delete the first working set.
